```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Merge Datasets

```{r}
e_mask=
read_csv("./Data/People_wearing_masks.csv") %>%
  janitor:: clean_names()  %>%
  select (geo_value, time_value, value, sample_size, stderr) %>%
  rename(maskwearing=value, maskwearing_stderr=stderr, maskwearing_samplesize=sample_size )

o_admission=
read_csv("./Data/Confirmed_admission.csv") %>%
  janitor:: clean_names() %>%
  select (geo_value, time_value, value )%>%
  rename(admission=value)

o_symptoms=
read_csv("./Data/Flu_like_symptoms.csv") %>%
  janitor:: clean_names()  %>%
  select (geo_value, time_value, value, sample_size, stderr) %>%
  rename(symptom=value, symptoms_stderr=stderr, symptom_samplesize=sample_size )

o_finances <-
  read_csv("data/worried.finances.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select()

merged_delphi=
  left_join(
  x = e_mask,
  y = o_symptoms,
  by = c("geo_value", "time_value"),
  all.x = TRUE) 

merged=
  left_join(
  x = o_admission,
  y = merged_delphi,
  by = c("geo_value", "time_value"),
  all.x = TRUE) %>%
  rename(state=geo_value, date=time_value) 
write.csv(merged,"merged.csv" )


```
